entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Perf improvement: json #43425
  • Uncatchable Exception While Using IFormFile Object Streams #43424
  • Allow endpoint filter attribute #43421
  • Debug is not working in ASPNET 7.0.100-preview7 when dotnet 6 is installed #43420

Closed

  • No service for type 'Microsoft.AspNetCore.Identity.RoleManager registered NET 6 #43327
  • Canceled client result can result in connection being closed #43054
    7.0-rc1
  • [Discussion] [Breaking change]: Unit testing SignalR Hubs may need updating #42326
    Discussions
  • Perf improvement: mvc #43385
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose #43405

PullRequests

Created

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 1956492 #43428
    area-infrastructure
  • [release/7.0-rc1] HTTP/3 flaky test retries and logging #43423
    area-runtime
  • Retry a few tests #43422
    area-infrastructure
  • WebTransport interfaces require preview features #43419
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0] Hot reload: Acknowledge Blazor component parameter removal #43418
    area-blazor, feature-hot-reload

Merged

  • Require CancellationToken for client results (and fix cancel closing connection) #43249
    area-signalr, 7.0-rc1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #43412
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution, 8.0-alpha1

Updated

  • [SignalR] Avoid blocking common InvokeAsync usage #42796
    area-signalr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0-rc1' => 'release/7.0' #43413
    area-infrastructure, Type: Merge Forward :fast_forward:, community-contribution
  • Strip Content-Length: 0 from responses that should not have a Content-Length #43417
    area-runtime
  • [release/7.0-rc1] Make Microsoft.AspNetCore.Grpc.Swagger experimental #43384
    area-grpc
  • Retry VariableMultipleStreamsInSequence test #43410
    area-infrastructure
  • Better support for HTTP/2 in SignalR .NET client #42817
    area-signalr, signalr-client-net, blog-candidate
